wf_workflow_version.name: mainWayLeaveSimpleFlow
wf_workflow_version.on_cancel: // This script executes if the workflow is cancelled.// The global variable context_sys_id contains the sys_id of the cancelled workflow context.

sys_variable_value.value: permission_by_grantor=true^permission_by_approver=true^EQ
permission_by_grantor=true^permission_by_approver=true^EQ
permission_by_manager=true^EQ
permission_by_manager=true^EQ

wf_activity.name: Wait for grantor and user permission

sys_variable_value.value: // Set the variable 'answer' to true or false to indicate if the condition has been met or not. answer = true;
permission_by_approver=true^permission_by_grantor=true^EQ
permission_by_approver=true^permission_by_grantor=true^EQ
// Set the variable 'answer' to true or false to indicate if the condition has been met or not. answer = true;

activity.display_value: Wait for grantor and user permission

sys_variable_value.value: permission_by_manager=true^EQ
// Set the variable 'answer' to true or false to indicate if the condition has been met or not. answer = true;
permission_by_manager=true^EQ
// Set the variable 'answer' to true or false to indicate if the condition has been met or not. answer = true;

from.display_value: Wait for grantor and user permission

to.display_value: Wait for grantor and user permission
